Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and faint traces of five lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393269) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393269)
